page.title: 10QUESTIONNAIRE SURVEY
page.content: Housing in Bar Hill is cheaper than the rest of the area and much cheaper than Cambridge itself so some people use it as a stepping stone to more expensive housing elsewhere.There is also a high proportion of young and ambitious professionals in the village who tend to stay two or three years and then move on.We hope that once the building stops,which it will do soon,the flow of people leaving the village will be balanced by those moving in. We found that 64% of our sample moved to the village in the first place because the housing is the cheapest in the area,but still very convenient for Cambridge.Even though so many people were forced to live here because of the high price of housing in our area,87% of our sample are very happy living in Bar Hill.
